div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1695 Benha (anc. Athribis), 1922-1923 (140) Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 14+ AV Ptolemy III: 8 octadr. (as Svoronos 603) ? tetradr. (as Sv. 604) Ptolemy IV: 6 octadr. (as Sv. 1131) Disposition: dispersed Newell, Num 1924, p. 301 ("exclusively" the types cited; unlikely therefore that no. 1682 above could be part of the present hd.) Brett, ANSMN 5 (1952), p. 7, note 3
